title: Congress approves change to Social Security for teachers, firefighters
shortDescription: The legislation will now go to President Joe Biden's desk and is expected to be signed into law.

title: Congress passes bipartisan funding deal, ending shutdown standoff
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump and multibillionaire Elon Musk had sunk an earlier bipartisan deal, only to see their preferred replacement voted down.

title: Biden abandons student debt relief proposals he lauded
shortDescription: The Education Department said it "intends to commit its limited operational resources to helping at-risk borrowers return to repayment successfully."

title: Shutdown could snarl the Trump transition
shortDescription: Less time to prepare, learn the job: What a shutdown could mean for next Trump administration.

title: Trump's agenda in trouble? What GOP revolt on spending bill tells us
shortDescription: Plan to avert a government shutdown backed by Trump failed with 38 Republicans opposing the bill. Does it mean his presidential agenda is in trouble?

title: Report shows deportation surge in 2024 under Biden
shortDescription: A U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement report reveals the highest single-year deportation total under President Biden since 2014.

title: Biden cancels another $4.28 billion in U.S. student loans
shortDescription: Friday's action brings the total public service student loans forgiven to about $78 billion for nearly 1.1 million workers, the department said.

title: The Republicans who defied Trump's plan to keep the government running
shortDescription: In just over 12 hours, the U.S. government will shut down unless Congress finds a way to fund it.

title: Biden notches highest level of deportations in a decade
shortDescription: The pace of removals last year was higher than the Trump administration achieved any year, report finds.

title: No stranger to shutdowns: Trump's history with government closures
shortDescription: The federal government shut down three times during Donald Trump's first term as president, including 35-day closure that is longest in U.S. history.

title: Government shutdown recap: Congress averts shutdown
shortDescription: Congress passed a bipartisan deal spending deal after Donald Trump and Elon Musk tanked an earlier bill. The government did not shut down.

title: Man charged with acting as Chinese agent in California election
shortDescription: Yaoning "Mike" Sun, who served as the campaign manager for a Southern California politician two years ago, was arrested Thursday, prosecutors said.

title: President Joe Biden to meet with Pope Francis at Vatican in January
shortDescription: Joe Biden's visit with Pope Francis will be part of a three-day trip to Italy in January, likely the last international trip of Biden's presidency.
